validation.mindst5Ord: Describe your task with at least 5 words ({{count}}/5)
validation.udfyldAlleFelter: Fill in all required fields to continue
validation.udfyldAlleFelterKontakt: Fill in all required fields (Full name, Email and Accept terms)

beskrivOpgaven.accepteredeFiltyper: We accept images, video and PDF
beskrivOpgaven.max5Filer: You can upload a maximum of 5 image or video files for the task.
beskrivOpgaven.aiBehandlerInfo: We AI-process your task to help you better. Click "Next" to continue. We only store personal data with your consent.
beskrivOpgaven.placeholder:
Example:

'I need to hang 2 curtains, 5 pictures, a TV, assemble a wardrobe and mount a lamp. The walls are made of concrete and I have a ladder.'
beskrivOpgaven.opdaterBeskrivelse: Please update your task description with more information.

kontaktinfo.modtagNyheder: I would like to receive marketing emails with seasonal offers and discounts

placeholder.kommentarer: Do you have any additional comments for us?

ekstra.ladOsForstaa: Let us understand your task a bit better, so we can solve it in the best possible way.
ekstra.viHarAlleOplysninger: We have all the information we need. You can continue to the next step.
ekstra.kunneIkkeIdentificere: We could not identify specific categories for your task. You can continue to the next step.

tidOgSted.kunneIkkeHenteTidspunkter: Could not fetch available time slots. Please try again.
tidOgSted.ingenLedigeMedarbejdere: No available workers found for this address and category.
tidOgSted.indtastAdresseForAtVise: Enter address to show time slots ...
tidOgSted.fortaelOsHvornaar: Tell us when you would like us to come
tidOgSted.kunneIkkeFindeMedarbejdere: We could not find workers who can solve this task at this address. Try changing the address or contact us directly.
tidOgSted.faktiskeTiderKanAfvige: * The actual arrival and departure times may differ from the times shown above. We strive to give proper notice on the day if we must make changes.
tidOgSted.placeholderManualTime: E.g. 'Monday morning next week' or 'As soon as possible'

summary.obsText: Times and duration may in some cases differ from the times shown.
summary.obsTextPriser: The final price depends, among other things, on the actual time and material consumption for the task.
summary.priserBr√∏dtekst1: We charge a fixed hourly rate for the time Bob is with you, plus a small startup fee. We always bill for a minimum of 1 hour. Material prices and any surcharges are added on top.
summary.priserBr√∏dtekst2: Below you can see our complete price structure (all incl. VAT).
summary.opstartsgebyrBeskrivelse: We always charge a startup fee. The amount covers our time and transport costs, as well as the most common screws and wall plugs.
summary.timeprisBeskrivelse: The hourly rate depends on whether the task requires heavy carpentry tools or not.
summary.till√¶gBeskrivelse: In some cases, we charge a surcharge on top of our normal prices.
summary.aftentill√¶g: Evening surcharge (19:00-23:00): +50% of the hourly rate
summary.nattill√¶g: Night surcharge (23:00-07:00): +100% of the hourly rate
summary.materialepriserBeskrivelse: If your task requires materials to be completed, we offer to bring them. Here we charge for the price of the materials plus the time we spend on procurement.
summary.k√∏rselUdenForCentrumBeskrivelse: If you live outside Copenhagen city center, we charge a fixed transport rate in addition to the startup fee.
summary.disseMedarbejdere: These workers were selected because they have work areas that cover the address ({{address}}), and they have competencies within the following task types: {{categories}}.
summary.ingenMedarbejdere: No workers were automatically assigned. The task will be manually assigned after receipt.
summary.systemHarVurderet: Our system has estimated that a task like yours will take us approximately {{hours}} {{hoursText}} to complete.
summary.viTagerForbehold: We note that all tasks are different. The actual time spent depends, among other things, on the scope of the task, materials, and any surprises along the way.
summary.detSammeGaelder: The same applies to the tasks we have completed before we come out to you. Therefore, we sometimes have to adjust the times a bit. We always strive to give clear notice of any changes during the day.
summary.tusindTak: Thank you very much for your understanding!

alerts.nogetGikGalt: Something went wrong. Please try again.
